Class Utils

java.lang.Object
com.oh2harjoitustyo.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Various constants and functions used globally

      public static final double ORIGINAL_SPAWN_INTERVAL

  • Method Details

    • clampToScreenHorizontal

      public static double clampToScreenHorizontal(double value, double size)
      Clamps a value to horizontal screen bounds for restricting player movement. Size can be taken into account so that the object doesn't penetrate the bounds.
      Parameters:
      value - Value to clamp
      size - Size of the object
      Returns:
      Clamped value

    • clampToScreenVertical

      public static double clampToScreenVertical(double value, double size)
      Clamps a value to vertical screen bounds for restricting player movement.
      Parameters:
      value - Value to clamp
      size - Size of the object
      Returns:
      Clamped value

    • calculateDistance

      public static double calculateDistance(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Calculates the Euclidean distance between two points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2)
      Parameters:
      x1 - 1st x-coordinate
      y1 - 1st y-coordinate
      x2 - 2nd x-coordinate
      y2 - 2nd y-coordinate
      Returns:
      Euclidean distance between the given points

    • calculateDistanceSquared

      public static double calculateDistanceSquared(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Calculates the square of the Euclidean distance between two points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2), that is (x2-x1)^2 + (y2-y1)^2
      Parameters:
      x1 - 1st x-coordinate
      y1 - 1st y-coordinate
      x2 - 2nd x-coordinate
      y2 - 2nd y-coordinate
      Returns:
      Square of the Euclidean distance between the given points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2), that is (x2-x1)^2 + (y2-y1)^2
